variable.name: randomization1
variable.description: First randomization result for intention to treat analysis

variable.name: ER_status_cumulative
variable.comment: Estrogen receptor status is assessed by local pathologies with immunohistochemistry and is considered positive if more than 9% of tumor cells are positive or immune reactive score (IRS) is over 3

variable.name: HER2_status_cumulative
variable.comment: HER2 Status is assessed by local pathologies and is considered to be positive if (DAKO score is 3+) or (DAKO score is 2+ and FISH or CISH or SISH is positive) or (FISH or CISH or SISH is positive)

variable.name: PR_status_cumulative
variable.comment: Progesterone receptor status is assessed by local pathologies with immunohistochemistry and is considered positive if more than 9% of tumor cells are positive or immune reactive score (IRS) is over 3

variable.name: menopause_status
variable.comment: A patient is considered to be postmenopausal if either laboratory results reveal postmenopausal status or the woman has not menstruated in the past 12 months

variable.name: TIME_DEATH
variable.comment: Time from date of randomisation until either date of death (from table "study_end") or the maximum of the following dates: randomization, last chemo application (from "chemo"), last zoledronic application (from "zoledron_therapy"), last follow-up (from "follow_up"), last contact (from "study_end")

variable.name: TIME_PROGRESS
variable.comment: Time from date of randomisation until either date of first progress (distant metastasis or local recurrence from "chemo_end", "zoledron_end", "follow_up", or death from "study_end") or the maximum of the following dates: randomization, last chemo application (from "chemo"), last zoledronic application (from "zoledron_therapy"), last follow-up from ("follow_up")

variable.name: STATUS_PROGRESS
variable.value: Event (distant metastasis, local recurrence, death) occurred

variable.name: IS_AE_CYCLE1
variable.description: Is there a grade 3 or grade 4 AE (leukopenia, neutropenia or febrile neutropenia) within chemo cycle 1 (yes/no)?
variable.value: Not applicable because chemotherapy was not given

variable.name: IS_AE_CYCLE123
variable.description: Is there a grade 3 or grade 4 AE (leukopenia, neutropenia or febrile neutropenia) within chemo cycles 1,2,3 (yes/no)?
variable.value: Not applicable because chemotherapy was not given

variable.name: IS_AE_CYCLE4
variable.description: Is there a grade 3 or grade 4 AE (leukopenia, neutropenia or febrile neutropenia) within chemo cycle 4 (yes/no)?
variable.value: Not applicable because patient left study before cycle 4 of chemotherapy

variable.name: IS_AE_CYCLE456
variable.description: Is there a grade 3 or grade 4 AE (leukopenia, neutropenia or febrile neutropenia) within chemo cycles 4,5,6 (yes/no)?
variable.value: Not applicable because patient left study before cycle 4 of chemotherapy
